item.title: Campaigns in Elasticsearch
item.description: In e-commerce search enabling dynamic prices or campaigns requires some attributes to be more volatile than others. A discount on Black Friday that is should only be valid between 7 PM and midnight. The flags that promote the discount. The teasers on product listings showing what products will be discounted, before the discount is in effect. Products that are only discounted for a certain customer group. Traditionally this is solved by updating the documents in the search index.
